column4: Hey guys, how to revert firefox aurora to firefox defaul in ubuntu. I installed and don't know revert!
so you added a PPA or something?
so what steps have you taken to try and uninstall?
from the Software Center, go to Edit -> Software Sources..., then make sure that the mozilla daily PPA is unchecked
you mean you unchecked the software sources entries?
okay - can you open a terminal and enter 'dpkg -l | grep firefox', pastebin the output and share the link?
try 'sudo apt-get remove firefox', then 'sudo apt-get install firefox'
you is good especialist in linux!
thanks, though there's always way more to learn! ;-)
